评论概述: Love Love Love this fun fur !
评论详情: American sizing … this is NOT Asian sizing. I am 5’3 and 145 pounds 38 DDD and ordered size 16 I am largest in the chest and torso area and this fit seemed plenty roomy and comfortable. (14 at first but exchanged for size 16 which was roomier and more comfortable in the shoulder and arms area) and true to size I would wear 14/16 usually so when in doubt I would size up. I received this purchase in TWO days. Packaging pristine … fur folded to the inside and fluffed right up after shaking out as instructed and I also fluffed it in the dryer with dryer sheet. Beautiful white color as described. Absolutely NO odor or smell of any kind. This beautiful and fun fur DOES have two pockets AND SEVERAL very sturdily constructed clasps for closure. I have read MANY reviews about this jacket and this is my experience. If you’re considering THIS cute jacket GO FOR IT. I have absolutely NO regrets. Photos are from a Taylor Swift themed brunch. I am 60 years old SO do not let ANYONE age shame YOU about THIS purchase !!
The quality of this coat is atrocious. Don't waste your money on it, the photo makes it look higher quality than it really is. It's worth maybe $5 tops, not $59.
This is absolutely horribly cheap and thin, $50+!?! WILD! don't waste your money this is a piece of crap.

评论概述: I ordered a 3XL as stated.  It was like a childs large or adult small.
评论详情: This item was way too small.  Sad because I really liked it.

Sadly I did not take a picture prior to return, This jacket is definitely petite Asian sizing but you do not see that listed and it is only marked as asian in the cart and not in the checkout. I only saw the size after reordering to return this one. For fit reference, 5'9" 110 lbs 34DD.  Shoulder tip to shoulder tip  17", and arms are 25".  Bust-wise, I could understand the fit being small, unfortunately, cound not fit shoulders into it... No give so we didn't try to clasp the bust.  The arms were just a little longer than 3/4 length.  This fits more like a child's size 12,  but it is difficult to tell from the reviews.The size 12 is a US size 6,size 14 is a US 8,size 16 is a US 10,and size 18 is a US 12.This is intended for a is for a very small framed (Narrow shoulder) petite person! A normal US 6 should have fit very loosely.  We have since ordered a size 18 (US12) for Halloween we'll post photos of the larger size. Good LUCK!

评论概述: Cute jacket even for tall people
评论详情: This jacket is really cute.  I am 5'8" 160lb and I have a difficult time finding jackets that are long enough. I ordered a size up. I normally would order a 10; but, I ordered a 12 to get a roomier fit.  I was very pleased with the 12. The arms are a little tight so that is why I gave it a 3 and not a 4. There is no give/stretch in the jacket so make sure you order a size up or you will not be able to bend your arms.  The look is cute and there are small clasps to close the jacket if you choose to. They are well disguised so you can't see them open or closed.  I would recommend getting this if you want to spice up a cute casual outfit or a dressy outfit. It can serve many uses!

I hung  jacket up and occasionally I would give it a good shake.  I will buy another in white for next season and to have in my closet.  Great price!!!
